sn22.65:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.65:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena …pe… pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.65:2.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.65:2.9: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.65:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.65:3.3: Rūpaṃ kho, bhikkhu, abhinandamāno baddho mārassa;
sn22.65:3.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.65:3.11: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
